name: Fond Farewell
description:
Fond Farewell is a short, narrative driven adventure game about holding on. Follow Noelle on her journey to say goodbye to a friend.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

E: Interact

J: Dash (Underwater only)

Credits:
